title: Add .ruby-version file and update travis.yml
body_html:
This updates our config for Travis to basically not build every PR twice. It should be enough to build every PR and the master / staging branch. If individual branches should be build, one can still do this by hand 👇

I also added a .ruby-version file so that Travis can pick it up. We won't be testing against any other versions + most people probably already use that file anyways ✌️ - therefore I don't see a problem in having it in the repo (maybe also makes it harder to accidentally use the wrong Ruby version).

Spoiler: I also started to use an interesting pattern to have fail-fast Travis builds at work. Will add a PR to the Teams App as well as soon as I find the time.
